channel.title: Patrick Mooney on The Huddle
channel.description: Recent content in Patrick Mooney on The Huddle

item.title: Tricks Of The Trade
item.description: As a player who is in all honesty not the most gifted and speedy athlete in the game, getting defensive turnovers with monster layouts and big skies is not always the best strategy for me. I learned early on however that I can still have a huge effect on the defensive side of the game by simply focusing on putting on a solid mark on the player I’m covering (or trying to cover) once they have the disc.
